title: New: Sea Change – Let's Dance
body:
Norwegian songstress Sea Change, who now lives in Berlin, is back with this pure bliss of electronic pop maelstrom.

Tempting you to dance with her minimalistic but magically weightless song ,**Let’s Dance** is a place where **PJ Harvey** and **Fever Ray** are best friends and make you feel so cozy under this suffocatingly glorious pop sounds. It’s been awhile since pop music sounded this charmingly irresistible.

\[soundcloud url=”https://api.soundcloud.com/tracks/129453587″ params=”color=ff6600&auto\_play=false&show\_artwork=true” width=”100%” height=”166″ iframe=”true” /\]
